troubleshooting.title: Scroll Function of my Notebook Trackpad is Not Working

keywords.indexterm: Trackpad scroll function doesn't work on Lenovo Thinkpad

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I got a new notebook (Lenovo Thinkpad with Windows) and noticed that the scroll function of my trackpad is not working in .

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: It is most likely a problem with the Synaptics trackpads.

steps-informal.p: Try adding the following lines to the C:\Program Files\Synaptics\SynTP\TP4table.dat file: *,*,oxygen.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9 *,*,oxygenAuthor.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9 *,*,oxygenDeveloper.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9 *,*,syncroSVNClient.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9 *,*,diffDirs.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9 *,*,diffFiles.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9*,*,syncroSVNClient.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9 *,*,diffDirs.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9 *,*,diffFiles.exe,*,*,*,WheelStd,1,9
